name: 002 The Interstellar Diva
description:
It's the year 2025 and it's been a couple of weeks since the 'Galactic Shuttle', a hotel spacecraft carrying those deemed "the best of humanity", was launched to find a new Earth as their old planet becomes unsustainable.

One of Earth's admired pop sensations, Aquarius was brought onto the 'Galactic Shuttle' to entertain the passengers. The popstar wishes to be trusted and liked by those around her, but one of the guests may want her dead.

CONTENT WARNING:  Opinions depicted occur for story purposes only and should not be interpreted as factual information.

This game is inspired by the word 'Privilege':

Privilege - a right or benefit that a person can have that acts as an advantage over others in society.

This game is inspired by Caricature:

Caricature is a  portrayal of characters by emphasising particular traits of a person in an extreme, mocking and/or grotesque way.
